user_query: I want to know the credit scores of hotels in New York, London, and Paris, fetch the latest prices of gold, silver, and platinum in euros, and calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay costing 500 euros in each city.

TaskList.description: Fetch the credit scores for hotels in New York, London, and Paris.
Retrieve the latest prices of gold, silver, and platinum in euros.
Calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay costing 500 euros in New York.
Calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay costing 500 euros in London.
Calculate the VAT-compliant price for a hotel stay costing 500 euros in Paris.
